metadata.title: CVE-2024-25743 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel through 6.9, an untrusted hypervisor can inject virtualinterrupts 0 and 14 at any point in time and can trigger the SIGFPE signalhandler in userspace applications. This affects AMD SEV-SNP and AMD SEV-ES.
